original_text: Hearken not to Hezekiah: for thus saith the king of Assyria, Make an agreement with me by a present, and come out to me: and eat ye every one of his vine, and every one of his fig tree, and drink ye every one the waters of his own cistern;
korean_text: 히스기야의 말을 듣지 말라 앗수르 왕이 또 이같이 말씀하시기를 너희는 내게 항복하고 내게로 나아오라 그리하면 너희가 각각 자기의 포도와 자기의 무화과를 먹을 것이며 각각 자기의 우물 물을 마실 것이요

sentences.original_text: for thus saith the king of Assyria,
Make an agreement with me by a present,
and eat ye every one of his vine,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각 사람은 그의 포도나무를 먹고

sentences.original_text: and every one of his fig tree,
and drink ye every one the waters of his own cistern;
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각 사람은 자기 물 웅덩이의 물을 마시라
